Subject: Halt? I think not!
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He hears a transmission on his comm. He opens a comm on Maximal
channels.
"Any Maximal recieving this, this is Hot Rod! I'm attempting to escape
the Alliance base. I'm in the ocean off their island. I'm being followed
by several troops. I need asistance. I repeat, I need asistance. This is
a back up request! And you better get here fast, or you'll have one dead
Maximal."
